content.detailedDescription:
I was driving home down state route 72, from my fiance's house when a green diamond shaped light streaked across the sky.  i would've attributed it to a comet or something, but it seemed too close to the earth.  it mosed faster than a plane. i immediately got excited and called my fiance to let her know.  she then told me she had seen a program on the discovery program about people seeing these things and i got excited and decided to inform mufon.
it isn't the first time i've seen this phenomenon.  this is the fifth.  first time writing about it.  over a span of about 8 months i've seen multicolored flares standing still then disapearing, or streaking.  i've seen blue, green and orange.
content.summary: A green diamond shaped light streaked across the sky, flared and disapeared.

content.detailedDescription:
I was outside taking pictures of the moon in the morning.  it was a very clear blue sky.  the moon was still visible.  

i noticed that there was something else in my view while i was searching for the moon in one of my photos.  i snapped the picture.  

i jokingly said to my family that i had just taken a picture of a ufo.

later after i uploaded the pictures i realized it was somewhat strange looking.  it does not look like a plane, or cloud to me. 

the object was very small and far away.  it was small in comparison to the moon.  if you were looking at the moon, it was to the left of the moon.  

i will attach several pictures.  the first is the object uncropped.  the file might be large, but is clearer to see if you zoom in.  

the second is the image cropped and closer.

the last is a picture of the moon.  the pictures were taken at about the same zoom level.

thoughts?
content.summary: Taking pictures of the moon in the morning.  noticed object in sky.

content.detailedDescription: Red,blue,green,white,  blinking lights...Maybe a satalight, definatly not a plane or helicopter.Been watching it for a week or so. first noticed it while taking pictures of the moon in my front yard. someone please tell me what im seeing if possible..You may be able to see it from where you are now if its dark out
content.summary: A brightly lite object that has been in the same place..Moves very little in a weeks time.

content.detailedDescription: Red,blue,green,white,  blinking lights...Maybe a satalight, definatly not a plane or helicopter.Been watching it for a week or so. first noticed it while taking pictures of the moon in my front yard. someone please tell me what im seeing if possible..You may be able to see it from where you are now if its dark out
content.summary: A brightly lite object that has been in the same place..Moves very little in a weeks time

content.detailedDescription: We took the dogs outside and there was an object that looked exactly like a star flying across the sky going north. there were also 2 planes in the sky and this looked nothing like them. it was one light and it was not blinking. all the sudden it disappeared. about 1 minute later it appeared again this time it was going the opposite direction going south and again disappeared. this is not the first out of the ordinary thing we have seen in the sky. we live in the country and are outside often. we've also noticed a light to the north of us that blinks orange, green, red, blue, yellow. it doesn't fly around, and it's always in the same general area, but never in the same spot. we've noticed this at least 20 to 25 times. i honestly don't know what either of these things could be. but being in the country and having full view of the sky you notice alot. we've tried to record this on our camera, but our camera is unable to pick these things up in the dark.
content.summary: An object was flying across the sky. it looked just like a star only it was flying like a plane. not a plane.

content.detailedDescription:
As we were driving up our street, my daughters and i saw a grayish/dark gray colored jellyfish like looking object.  it was waving in the air like a stingray would in the water.  it just floated in the air and then totally vanished.  it was about the size of two cruise ships stacked on top of each other. it was big, much bigger than a 747.  if we had to guess, we would say it was about two miles from where we were driving.

i would really be curious to know if anyone else saw this so i would know that i am not crazy.
content.summary: Just before noon, as we were driving, we saw a jelly fish/ray type object  hovering over our neighborhood.

content.detailedDescription:
I went out on my balcony for a cigarette break, saw an object traveling from the west, headed in an eastern direction. there was no exhaust trail, no noise, seemed to be moving at a steady (fast speed), with no decline in altitude level.

***here are the last 3 photos (magnify the area in the center of the red circular highlight to see the object).
content.shape: Bullet,  Missile,  Cylinder,  Disc,  Oval,  Other,  Unknown

content.detailedDescription:
Driving down highway 3 into yellowknife from hay river... seen a bright light that appeared to be a shooting star.. was captured by it when it stopped moving and hovered in 1 location for a while. i pulled the transport over and watched the object through binoculars.

seen sphere shaped object in the sky.... moving closer and further away..... at great speed.... then hovering.

changed colors... red... blue. green and seemed to have a ring of lights around it... like the rings of saturn.

turned off headlights on vehicle as it was after 11 pm... object hovered and then came closer... got scared and turned headlights back on... object moved closer...

there was no noise coming from the object... and it seemed to take on 2 shapes.. between vertical and horizontal movement...

the lights surround the object changed between the 3 colors mentionned above
stayed and watched it decend and ascend for an hour... then headed into yellowknife...

seen on 4 occassions that week.
content.summary: Driving down highway 3 into yellowknife from hay river... seen a bright light that appeared to be a shooting star.. was captured by it when it stopped moving and hovered in 1 location for a while. i pulled the transport over and watched the object through

content.detailedDescription:
I am attaching a pictures extracted from the video sequence submitted for the sept 30th, ufo.  this picture was quite a good one, so i decided to enhance it further for detail.

i put this picture through several techniques to enhance the image for detail.  the laundry list of enhancements is as follows:

1.  applied a super-resolution technique to use multiple frames of the ufo (it paused a few times in flight for microseconds) via the software package qe super-resolution to increase the resolution of the picture.

2.  applied bicubic resampling to further increase the resolution of the original image using "iris" free astronomy software.    iris software is used by astronomy professionals to enhance pictures of stars and constellations.

3.   i applied wavelet algorithms from the iris package to further increase the resolution of the picture.

4.  i applied the open source gimp software, specifically the gimp "neon" edge detection algorithm to improve the picture to the point where a truly alien looking vehicle emerged from the originally blurry picture.  please see attached pictures to see the sequence of these improvements.
content.summary: Update to september 30 report

content.detailedDescription: For the past week there have been fireball ufo"s flying at incredable speeds over lake mi. also being persued by jet aircraft. making w like patters and bouncing up and down like pingpong balls. stealth aircraft have been seen many of these nights "in chase"of the fireballs. also a strange bight multicolor light object has been hanging over the lake without moving what so ever. lights are in the west and southwest of the sky moving very fast and extremely irratic. following no flight path or keeping a straight line. have aslo been going from dead stop to light speed and them stoping dead again. very stange but becoming too often of a sight in the sky. i allmost expect them to be there since they have every night for the past wek. what is this????? too fast to be a plane and making manuvers that would kill a person from the inside out. whatever these are they are pulling some serious g's......
content.summary: More fireballs over lake michigan

content.detailedDescription: We where taking a walk outside my neighborhood and then we saw this small stationary light, that was red and white. at first, i thought it was  a plane but then i went inside my house and took binoculars and sat outside looking at this object.  when i first saw it, it was so bright, and blinking everynow and then, not typical of a plane that sits in one place. i also had notcied that it revolved around in circles similar to spinning, which made me think, "mhmm this is interesting." basically when i sat outside watching, the object would remain visable for about 10 minutes and then dissapper for about 5 min. then it would reapper off and on. this lasted for about 50 min.  i think that this is definetly a ufo and i actually tried calling the franlkin institute in philadelphia to report this sighting, however, they were closed.  finally, after the 50 minutes, its dissappeared and i went inside.  who knows, it could even be out there right now.
content.summary: Stationary, blink off and on, dissapeard sometimes, red/white lights, visable for aobut 10 minutes

content.detailedDescription: My friend and i were driving to the glenbrook mall in fort wayne, in. we were in my 1981 camaro and i was driving. we got to u.S. 37 after driving through the amish country side on doty road. it was still daylight at this time and the sun was just starting to set and was casting an orange overcast on the clouds. we went under the first underpass and traffic was moving slow, about 35 mph. just shortly after we passed the overpass i noticed a glimmer out the corner of my eye. this would be out the driver side window, about 2,000 ft away or so. at this time the wal-mart and everything on that side of the road was not there. i turned my head to look and see what it was and after a couple glances over, from driving the car and looking at this glimmering, my eyes focused and to my surprise there was a spacecraft. it was obvious, the orange of the sun on the bottom and the reflection of the clouds and blue sky on the top. i immediately, turned back to my friend and screamed, "it's a real ufo!, it's a real ufo!, oh my god!, look! look!". she then replied, "oh god, your right! i thought i would never see another one again!*". i continued to glance over to the object and back at the road and between glaces it disappeared. i looked to my friend and said, "where did it go? it's gone!". she then said, "no, it's above us!". i then moved forward, then to the side, looking out the windshield and driver side window, then i said, "i can't see it!". right at that moment it pulled slightly ahead of us. i could then see the nose of this thing and the sides of it stuck out about a foot and a half on either side of the camaro. the nose was shaped to what reminded me of a dolphins nose. i did not feel threatened in any way and was amazingly calm. i tried slightly swerving to the left and then to the right and it stayed perfectly positioned above us with a 1 sec delay. i sped up and slowed down and it did the same with a slight delay. i looked up out the window and could see my reflection on the bottom of it. it was perfect, like chrome, but better. it had no wings, seams, visible propulsion, windows, lights, or antennas. it didn't even have a place for a door. it was about 4 to 4 1/2ft from the top of the car. it made no sounds, not even air rumbling or any other kind. it did not interfere with the radio or the engine. we had no missing time, it flew above us for about 15 minutes. when we got to the curve going left in the road, it broke away from us and kept flying straight the went up and over the trees. when it did this, it was so incredibly graceful. it was almost as if it was on an invisible track, like when a roller coaster goes over a hill. when i seen this i knew immediately that it was not from earth, honestly, it was too nice looking. this vessel was about 15-20ft long about 10-12ft at it's widest point it was shaped sort of like a nerf football. it looked strikingly like the alien spacecraft on disney's, "flight of the navigator", only it didn't have the humps, it was smooth all the way around, the nose was different, and it was perfectly reflective.
content.summary: Driving my camaro, see spacecraft and it flies above my car, vessel matched speed and direction.

content.detailedDescription:
I was outside smoking a cigarette on my side porch and spotted an abnormally bright, pulsating object, high in the atmosphere.  initially i believed it to be a star, but it had an orange tint to it so i watched it for a while and that's when i realized it pulsated more than an average star.

i went inside to get my crappy nikon coolpix 3200 digital camera and snapped a few photos at full zoom.  when i downloaded these photos they seemed all black, so i put them on the computer and pressed auto adjust color and the objects were more visible and took on a weird form.
content.summary: Shape changing?

content.detailedDescription:
at 9:30 p.M. me and my friend were called to come outside by my friends dad. we looked into the sky and there were 2 lights bigger and brighter than stars. these white lights were able to change how bright and dim they were. they also had a red light on it that would quickly blink on occasion. when i first looked at it i thought it was a big star until it started moving.

            these lights were moving in all directions and were able to change direction very fast. these lights would go in circles around each other and drift apart. they would go as high as the moon was and drop to behind the mountains in about 1 and one half seconds. when planes flew by these lights would dim so much that they could not be seen and as soon as the plane was gone the light would go up and start shining. during this time my cell phone was not able to call or receive calls or messages. my friends house phone that he brought was also having difficulty calling people. i lost sight of the object when it disappeared behind the mountains. 

the background of this scene was a california suburb with many trees and mountains in the background. there was also a grey hazy in the sky around this time but it was not very close to the lights. there was at least 11 witnesses and one of them was a police officer.
content.summary: Lights seen moving in all directions in southern california

content.detailedDescription:
This is my second ufo sighting in the area of sylmar, california.  there were three main fires occuring in my area, including porter ranch that night. in sylmar it was being called the merrick fire. there were helicopters both monitoring and fighting the fires.  but this was not a helicopter.  this was a glowing, pulsating light which hovered for an extended period of time over the area between sylmar and porter ranch.  it did not move - it just pulsated light for about 20 minutes.  from time to time it would move further away from my apartment, but then it would just hover, remaining perfectly still.  the sun had set with a slight glow in the night sky, so most of the sky was dark now.

in this event the ufo was much closer to me than the first which i had encountered, but was still far enough away that no true detail could be seen - aside from the obvious illumination from the craft itself. there was no reflection - just a glowing, pulsating light.  no sound came from the vehicle either.
content.summary: A hovering object above sylmar, ca - with a pulsating light.

content.detailedDescription:
Using a very cheap webcam, converted to near ir, i observed two ufo peeling off into the sky at roughly a 45 degree angle.  you have to slow the film down quite a bit.  the ufo that comes into frame on the right has discernable structure and an observation dome at the top.  i've provided the video, and two photos enhanced using iris astronomy software to extract details of the second craft's structure.

note the first picture shows a near-ir picture of my windows "cross bars", and an observation dome at the top of the craft.

the second picture, also extracted from the video and also enhanced with wavelet algorithms, shows two exhaust-type structures underneath the craft.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Two ufos peeling off into the sky, observed from window

content.detailedDescription:
Converted an ordinary near 19 dollar canadian ir webcam into a near infrared webcam.  this made is easy to detect the ufo probe shown in the following sequence.    this only took a few hours to find in the skies over calgary.  many more sequences of fast moving rods, and high flying objects in clouds.

the sky appears dark because it is shot in near infrared, using two film black negatives to block out all light but in the near infrared spectrum.
content.summary: Converted ordinary webcam into near-ir webcam, easily viewed ufo object

content.detailedDescription:
I was taking pictures of my living room and kitchen with a new digital camera in the evening last week.  i noticed nothing unusual.  a few days later i viewed the photographs and noticed a strange anomolous golden teardropshaped object in the top of a few of the photographs.  i thought it was a camera error of some sort - and still consider this as a possibility - exept when i looked closely there is a shadow behind the object!!! i have photos of the same view in my living room taken minutes later where the object does not exist!  

maybe someone can tell me what this is.
content.summary: I was taking pictures of my living room and kitchen with a new camera.

content.detailedDescription:
We was on our way home in the car on barking road heading toward eastham.
i saw a very bright light in the sky as it was getting dark and assumed it must be the north star but then i realized that it was cloudy and it wouldn't have been visible plus the light was too bright.
as we approached closer i could see it didn't have a flashing white light so it could not have been a plane or helicopter, then i opened my winndow and turned my head up toward the sky, i watched it for about 3 mins get closer, by now it was almost over head and i couln't see a bright light hardly at all anymore and i said to my partner look at that, he looked hard at it too and he couln't explain it either.
we stared for about 2 mins before getting cought at traffic lights and at this time we were underneath it, i kept thinking was is it, there has to be a reasonable explaination.
but the more i thought i just knew it was a ufo it was a dark grey colour with an orange/red glowing light that orbited it,there was a beaming light glowing upwards and it was spinning, it was swaying, well almost gliding from side to side and and had staggered movements then it was stationary for about 30 seconds then staggered again, the traffic lights changed but i was mesmerized and i still had my head stuck out side of the car, as the car started to move it went straight up and was getting fainter and fainter.
unfortunatley our phone didn't take video and the camra was not in working order, but i am happy now that i have seen one.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Very bright light on top and a dark graphite colour underneath orange/red orbiting light round it.

content.detailedDescription:
At the time of the incident, i was a sophomore in high school. i have visited the specific site of the occurrence and looked for some clue that does not exist. over the years, i did reconfirm this incident with my mother and father and with a neighbor (described below). 

we were visiting my grandparents home 3-4 miles outside the village of gnadenhutten, ohio (tuscarawas county). it was a late summer (1961) evening, i went outside into the driveway to start my father���s car, (15 years old and looking for any excuse to start the car) in preparation to leave on our 25 minute trip back into town.

i noticed what appeared to be a large (10���-20���) fire in his woods across the road from the house (400-500 yard distance) slightly uphill and beyond a creek. i knew the area well, as, i hunted this entire 250 acre farm. 

i immediately reported the fire to my grandfather when returning to the farmhouse, he was concerned about the spread of a potential forest fire, so, several of us proceeded to the side porch to verify the position. the fire did not appear to be spreading, and, he assumed some dear hunters were camping in his woods, however, he called a couple neighbors, to verify the location and get their opinions.

within 5-10 minutes we noticed what initially appeared to be a spread of the fire along the woods floor moving from our left to right and following the contour below the ridge of the hill. this was strange, as, the previous location of the fire was not burning. the fire was moving at an angle closer to our position when one of us noticed this was caused by a pulsating light (red some yellow mixed with white) coming down from above, not a fire.

the reality that something was emitting a light strong enough to make the floor of the woods appear to be on fire took a few minutes to sink in. we all noticed an additional hazy light source in a band encircling the craft that was suspended or flying over the treetops. this thing was moving about 50-100 feet per minute. 

the one very unusual thing was the lack of any sound, in fact, the only sounds were the normal night creatures from this wooded farm area. this is significant in that this entire occurrence took place in a narrow (maybe 600 yards wide) valley surrounded by 250-300 foot hills. 

we all watched in total shock as we could more clearly see the shape of the unit as it approached us to within 250-300 yards. it was silhouetted against the hill and the trees were dark, so, the only light source was from within the craft, in a band around the center section and the light from the bottom. my best guess is that the craft was wider than my grandfather���s two-story farmhouse, and, ��� as high. 

at its closest point we could more clearly see the light shinning down through the treetops as a wavy but concentrated shaft of light all the way to the floor of the woods. the tree branches and leaves were visible under this somewhat blinding (high intensity) light. 

when the unit moved beyond the woods it was suspended approximately 150- 200 feet over a hay field and the shaft of light was not so apparent, however, it began to angle (about 45 degrees) itself skyward and with ever increasing speed soon (less than 10 seconds) became a distant white spot, before vanishing in the night sky. the bottom of the unit, when changing attitude was multi colored but mostly reds to orange mixed with some white.

two families of neighbors witnessed this occurrence as my grandfather called both to question what they saw. everyone agreed this was unexplainable, and, we should not tell this story, to avoid redicule from others.

everyone in my family is gone, however, my sister (she was 11 at the time) does remember that some thing happened but not any details. last year, i asked one of the neighbor boys if he recalled the incident and he was stunned that i would mention that evening. he confirmed, he saw this unexplainable occurrence but he was at an angle to witness the event more from an end position, whereby, the craft was moving toward their family before leaving the woods. his family porch would be ��� mile to the right of my grandfathers as we viewed this craft moving from left to right and the point of departure was a little right of center from our porch position.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Woods floor appeared on fire, light/fire moved, noticed trees/leaves had pulsating light from above trees, object moved slowly closer than departed shortly.

content.detailedDescription:
Climbing cathedral rock in sedona i took lots of photos on this clear day.
when i got home and opened the photos and enlarged the attached  picture and i noticed 2 silver objects and 4 dark objects in some sort of pattern in the sky.  when i looked at the other photos i took they were not there.
content.summary: Climbing cathedral rock i took this photo.  i discovered the objects when i got home and didn't see them at the time.

content.detailedDescription: My way to work saw snack shop every day a woman from saint petersburg owned shop in lake worth ,florida off 10th avenue i was just about there 2 buildings from shalloway surveyors i worked there.Hovering after choosing spot driven to that ifo went to shoot once missed with lasar then fired lasar again the lasar disc is out and up above ship like 15 feet shot at columbia shuttle nasa had killing all members of crew i have read of the inncodent and seen many photos of the lasers that did it but not the ship.I wrote to mufon years afo about 7 page forms mufon signs and i also have seen dragons fight in sky of baltimore city to north skies yes both inncodents were real the dragons live on this planet sometimes breathe fire .The inncodent occured i stood and stared at ifo and thought it left flew away later that day i went to see my neice born at good samaritan hospital at noon on same day i think jan 28 1986 you can match real day it occurred i know i was there.Thanks for all your help.
content.summary: 100 guns and lasar disc only quiet non trackable form driven hovering ifo

content.detailedDescription: It is friday at 4:17am. just got up for work, grabbed some coffee, sitting at the computer, i noticed something flashing in the window. i got up, looked out and seen 2 solid white flashing balls darting around in the sky. i got up, went downstairs, went outside on my deck. there are no street lights where i live, so it was pretty dark. we had a full moon a few days ago, but today was cloudy, no rain. i watched these balls, speed out to one area, stay still, then dart out into another area. we have had a lot of military activity out here lately so i was thinking at that point that it might be them again, but the speed and distance that they traveled was just too fast. they would seem to get brighter, then fade out some, but come right back again. i watched them for about 10 minutes. while in the sky, the balls , in size were smaller than the full moon would be in the sky, they were about the size of a baseball held up in the air in front of you.I had to go back in to get ready for work and on my way out the back door to the car, i couldn't see them anymore. my feelings at first was trying to determine what sort of military craft they were, but very quickly realized that they weren't ours. then i felt a bit nervous, because i was alone and didn't think anyone else had seen this and was afraid to mention this to anyone because i work for the military, but things like this need to be reported.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Seen 2 round white ball like objects rapidly flashing and blinking in the sky, would hover than take off

content.detailedDescription: I awoke earlier than usual this morning. i always go out by the pool and have a smoke as soon as i get up. i've always been a sky watcher, so i scanned the skies, enjoying the stars. i'm facing east, and out of the north at about a 45' angle at about the 10:00 position, i see 4 lights moving in unison. i could determine that they were all on the same craft. i can't say at what altitude. i watch them until they reach about the 12:00 position at the same 45' angle at my position. it was moving in a southerly direction and after it crossed the 12:00 position, the lights started fading and simply vanished. i watched in the line of flight to see if it reappeared, thinking my eyes were playing tricks on me. nothing. i waited on engine noise. nothing
content.summary: Undetermined lights over southern indiana

content.detailedDescription:
labor day weekend 1976, as i was walking up coast highway in ventura county. early a.M. i saw a red light several times on a power line between two poles directly opposite of me. the light was exactly like stephan spielberg first movie (firelight). also close encounters. the next night i was taken by police to venture county airport, were i was taken to a quonset hut, where i may have seen an alien like in close encounters. i leaned to my right on a gurney and said "i love you" to the alien, but i was unable to make any sound. 
    i was then taken to a state hospital for six weeks, and was told i couldn���t work for two years. two months later i got a job as a special service police officer in san francisco. in the spring of 1978 as i was going to sleep i had a strong shock in my forehead. i quit the police force because i had flash backs. there is much more to this story, if you are interested please contact me by phone or letter, i am a former state section director for del norte county california.

thank you,
frank e johnstone
content.summary: Red light on power line, 24 hrs later, alien encounter at air port

content.detailedDescription:
a friend and i were driving eastbound on us60 between kings ranch rd and peralta trail. off to the south east we observed a mid-air smoke circle and line of smoke through the circle. very high, maybe 10,000'- 15'000', could have been a meteorite breaking up over the desert. but a later event in the day made me reconsider this. the entire sky was cloud free and a very gentle breeze allowed the plume to be visible for sometime, which made me believe it was rather large. as i was driving i could not focus on it very long but my friend was very aware of it as he was in the passenger seat on the side of the smoke. he was the one whom noticed it. we both do not wear glasses for corrected vision. i have noticed this type of object before on two other ocassions.
 then later in the afternoon at approximatly 2:45pm i was again traveling eastbound on us60 between idaho rd and tomahawk rd when i noticed a very fast moving cigar shaped very bright object moving from superstition mountain towards the south, about 1.5 - 2 miles from where i was situated. i would state that it was approx 150'- 200' feet in length/diameter at it's largest. it appeared to change shape from cigar shape to a disc to a very condensed point twice, then it disappeared. it was slowly steadily climbing in altitude and at about 1,500' - 6,000' and cruising steadily at about 300+ mph. i did note the bright sunlight and thought that it might have been the sun glinting off of the object that made it appear to change shape, but as i watched it i discounted that and definitly saw it change shape before i lost it. it was again changing shape to a point when i lost it. i did not see any wings nor stabilizer and observed it for about 15 seconds total. it maintained a steady brightness unlike sunlight shining off it. i am aware of williams gateway airport in this area and this did not appear to be a typical military or civilian aircraft. after i came home i called my friend that was with me ealier in the day and he reflected on the earlier smokeplume when i explained to him what i had seen. that made us think maybe they were connected possibly.
content.summary: Smoke plume mid-air, object observed 6 hours later possibly unrelated, same vacinity.

content.detailedDescription: Well it was exactly 7:48 pm because of so many sightings we've had i always check the time before i look up to stargaze and last night was no excetion, it was me my father in law and a long time friend, we went out specically to look for ufo's as we've seen them before and beleive there is a upswing in sightings, when we all looked up we immediatly saw two stars that seemed to move then one became much brighter than all the stars in the sky then it decended almost to the ground, mind you we were far away from what we saw but it was a very dramatic drop then it gained altitude at near split second speed passed where we first saw it then it went to a little bunch of stars and kind of hid among them but we continued to watch it for about 20 minutes as that one  seemed to be watching us the other one was cruising around the sky darting about in random patterns moving like something other than conventioal aircraft, after a few seconds maybe 20 to 30 seconda then dissappeared after that we focused on the first, then we saw 5 more racing across the sky going south towards the patch of stars that the first one was camoflaged in then the first star or whatever they were joined the rest of the lights that was passing by and they all flew off towards the south together, now what we saw was pretty incredible but not surprising as we here in merced see this type of action almost every night and feel that any true investigator will have no problem filming them as i have a digital camera, these things are to high for my camera to pick up but whatever it is it sure seems to be taking a closer look at us or are getting very comfortable
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: 7  luminaries looked like stars but moved very fast and went in all directions

content.detailedDescription: It took place at my home in the sky i so 5 space sheps that was circle bells in the sky in the day time. i and my family so this event over our home.
content.summary: Silver and black circle  star sheps

content.detailedDescription: We were going to sleep in a tent in the backyard of our house.It was around my birthday.I had a couple of friends staying with me.It was late.It was dark.I dont remrmber a whole lot about it,but i remember me and one freind looking up and seeing the object in the sky.I dont remember hearing any noise from it,it seemed to hover,it was hard to tell how far away it was,but i dont think it was more than a couple of hundred yards away.I dont remember it flying off.Ijust remember looking at it in the sky.Idont think me and my freind talked a whole lot about it,but when we were in high school i mentioned it to him at a party and he confirmed that he remembred seeing it to .After high school i didnt see much of the freind.He went to college upstate and eventually became a doctor and now resides in san antonio.Its been a long time since i talked to him but iknow what i saw and im sure he remembers seeing it also.Im not saying what we seen was a ship with alien beings flying in it.Im just saying i know what i saw was not conventional or from the military. even with the technological advances man has made since then,what we saw was not conventional then or now or even in the near future.I really just want,whoever takes these kind of things serious to know what was or still is out there,because i think everyone on this planet needs to know the truth.
content.summary: Sphere in the sky  that looked like a round rubiks cube with  panels that changed colors very fast
